about.title: My Three.js Projects
about.more02: 🌐 A convenient and powerful starter template for creating modern Single Page Applications (SPA) with 3D graphics integration.
about.more03: ✨ This minimalist site supports three languages (Ukrainian, English, Spanish) and is fully responsive for all devices: from smartphones to desktops. 📊 The template is prepared for integration with Google Analytics and Google Search Console, making it ideal for performance analysis and monitoring.
about.more04: 🚀 Thanks to its flexibility and scalability, this solution is perfect for any web project that supports 3D graphics! 💻🌟
about.name: Name
